page.title: 10Stifford Moat House Hotel.
page.content: This hotel is very big and luxurious. It has over 100 bedrooms and each has a colour t.v., private bathroom,telephone and tea making facilities.There is a laundry room where sheets,pillowcases,curtains etc.,are stacked in piles of ten and fifty so that cleaners can take what they need instantly. There are large grounds surrounding this three star hotel.Its restaurant is called the Regency Restaurant.The hotel was situated here because it is near the new motorway (M25) and the Dartford Tunnel.It is also near Tilbury and Purfleet docks,so businessmen who are working around the area have a convenient place to stay.There are also facilities for conferences,wedding receptions and private parties at the hotel. By Scott Gibson.
